original_title: Nach Schwarz kommt keine Farbe mehr
overview: Navid is a young Iranian who discovers that he is attracted to men. He lives with his Persian family in a small village where homosexuality and tradition are incompatible. His mother asks him to leave the village. Navid sets off for the big city, where he quickly meets like-minded people. Uncertainty remains, however, as homosexuals continue to be persecuted in Iran.
title: No Colour Darker than Black
